name: javascript-sdk
description: JavaScript SDKs for the Boring Metrics API
author: Aymeric Chauvin <contact@halftheopposite.dev>

scripts.build: yarn workspace @boringmetrics/core build && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/browser build && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/node build && yarn workspace build
scripts.types:check: tsc --noEmit --project tsconfig.json && yarn workspaces run tsc --noEmit
scripts.clean: yarn workspace @boringmetrics/core clean && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/browser clean && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/node clean && yarn workspace clean
scripts.publish:all: yarn build && yarn publish:core && yarn publish:browser && yarn publish:node
